alert.note: Alert for Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued November 28 at 2:47PM MST until November 29 at 8:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 8 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Uplands of the Bootheel County. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 8 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Occasional gusts of up to 60 mph are possible at the highest elevations of the advised area from 6 AM MST Tuesday through noon Tuesday.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
